citations.narrative:
The outdoor south-facing wall that dogs can touch is made of concrete-blocks and has not been sealed. Walls and
surfaces that dogs can contact must be impervious to moisture to allow routine cleaning and sanitizing. Ensure that this
area of the wall is impervious to moisture.
***Correct by 11/29/2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.

narrative:
3.3(e)(1)(iii) 
   
Sheltered housing facilities. 
The outdoor south-facing wall that dogs can touch is made of concrete-blocks and has not been sealed. Walls and 
surfaces that dogs can contact must be impervious to moisture to allow routine cleaning and sanitizing. Ensure that this 
area of the wall is impervious to moisture.  
***Correct by 11/29/2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
